Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
OWOWWW is a Hong Kong-based drone show operator specializing in the integration of cutting-edge technology and artistic innovation to elevate public and private events.
 As a pioneering creative company, we deliver comprehensive, end-to-end solutions that combine precise drone choreography with dynamic visual storytelling and creative direction.

-

Our mission is to transform the sky into a canvas for immersive, unforgettable experiences — what we define as “OWOWWW moments.”
 From large-scale public spectacles to bespoke brand showcases, OWOWWW seamlessly blends technology, artistry, and execution to inspire audiences and create lasting impact.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1. Drone Performance Video Footage
	•	Multi-drone formation flight recordings (multi-angle)
	•	Rehearsal and official performance videos (for promotion and playback analysis)
	•	Event aerial footage (venue aerial shots, audience interaction)

2. Test Flight Recordings
	•	Raw flight control video data (HD)
	•	Flight path replay videos
	•	Key maneuver test clips (e.g., emergency stops, flips, high-speed passes)

3. Marketing & Branding Materials
	•	Promotional videos, commercials, documentary clips
	•	Demonstration videos delivered to clients
	•	Archived media coverage and reposted content

4. Flight Parameter Records
	•	Flight altitude and route coordinates for each mission
	•	Battery usage, voltage, current, and temperature logs

This is a sample of our current directory structure

We primarily standardize data into different formats, mainly using the FFmpeg tool.
In addition, we use the company’s MongoDB database to record data.
When processing the data, we may use Python to handle abnormal data and related situations.
Finally, after the data is processed, we primarily use ZIP for data compression and HTTP for data transmission.
